title: my idea for a new champion
body: im sorry if i posted this in the wrong room because i dont really use the boards.  anyways i think it would be cool if they made a pupil for wukong because in wukongs lore it says "under the condition that Kong would one day teach the lessons of Wuju to a pupil of his own". this is just my idea it probably wont be noticed or considered because wukong is an old champion but i thought i would share it.
